channel.title: Clicking something?
channel.description: I want to make it so when I click a specific sprite on my client that it will change into a different one. In my case I did a clan chat interface and i want it so when I click the Lootshare icon it will light up. Does anyone know how to do that?

item.title: Clicking something?

item.description:

I want to make it so when I click a specific sprite on my client that it will change into a different one. In my case I did a clan chat interface and i want it so when I click the Lootshare icon it will light up. Does anyone know how to do that?
